[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@sigmamessaging/otp-sdk](./otp-sdk.md) &gt; [NestJSSigmaOtpModule](./otp-sdk.nestjssigmaotpmodule.md)

## NestJSSigmaOtpModule class

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Модуль для регистрации маршрутов для NestJS

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class NestJSSigmaOtpModule 
```

## Example


```typescript
import { Module } from '@nestjs/common'
import { ConfigModule, ConfigService } from '@nestjs/config'
import { NestJSSigmaOtpModule } from '@sigmasms/otp-sdk/controllers/nestjs-otp-module/nestjs-otp.module'
import { SigmaOtpSDKEnvironmentEnum } from '@sigmasms/otp-sdk/types/types'
@Module({
 imports: [
 NestJSSigmaOtpModule.register({
   prefix: 'test',
   apiUrl: 'http://SDK-url/sdk',
   environment: SigmaOtpSDKEnvironmentEnum.production,
   apiToken: 'test'
 })

   // or

 ConfigModule.forRoot(),
 NestJSSigmaOtpModule.registerAsync({
   useFactory: async (configService: ConfigService) => ({
     environment: SigmaOtpSDKEnvironmentEnum.production,
     apiToken: configService.get<string>('SIGMA_SDK_TOKEN'),
   }),
   inject: [ConfigService],
 }),
],

controllers: [],
providers: []
})
export class AppModule {}
```
